title: Lookin for sexy trucker lady
text:
Are there any non smoking trucker ladies that might want to drive team with me later on. Initially, I need someone to house/cat sit so I can drive a truck again myself. Then I'd be willing to pay to send you to school, & after about a year, i'm pretty sure the company would let me train you myself. I do have over 3 yrs exp otr. To be honest, 6 wks out with a trainer after school really isn't enough training. I can remember when they let me loose, I was still mainly focused on just driving the truck. Of course the first thing they do is send you to New Jersey or New York City. Worst place you can go for beginner truckers, but not so bad if you have a co driver helping you navigate & do the paperwork. 

I don't care if you are a bit chunky. I don't like skinny chicks anyway. I'm white, 6'1" 175, so I'm not going to embarass you. I don't talk much either. I mainly just prefer peace & quiet, although on the road, a person really does have to keep the cb on for safety reasons, & the radio on to break the monotany.

We can make $100k per yr, & that's without pushing it. I don't want to push it anyway, since there's no need for it. The trucking company will still make a lot more money off the truck than they would with a solo driver. It's a tough way of life, but if you aren't a glamour gal, you can handle it. Forget the makeup, shaving your legs, & wearing hot clothes. I'm just looking for someone that is easy to get along with. I know I am. If you miss a gear occasionally, no biggy, I'm not the best gear jammer in the world myself. I actually would consider myself to be the perfect trainer. I don't raise my voice or holler at people. My job would be to help you be successful, not make your life a living hell.

I do need to clarify that I'm not offering you a full time salary to cat sit, so you can quit your day job. Yes, that would be a nice gig if you could get it, but taking care of a cat is not that hard. You will get a free place to live though, & I'm thinking the smartest thing for me to do would be to take the utility bills out of $500 a month & pay you the rest. My bills last month were $50 gas, $160 electric water sewer waste pickup drainage totalcare. So that would be $290 for you that month. I am on Rate plan B so the gas bill isn't likely to ever get above $200 a month.

The real benefit would be teaming up with me, making $100k per yr, & I'll make sure this house gets in your name too. I'd even be willing to marry you if we make a good team. I'm not going to use you & toss you aside. Besides, half that $100k is yours to sock away anyway, so you can't lose on this deal. If you want to keep your day job, leave the trucking to me, & keep this a business relationship, that's fine too. If you have a lot of stuff, I would be willing to pay up to $100 a mth to put it in storage, & gradually replace my stuff, after we get your name on the deed.

I will say I don't get many inquiries. It would seem that by our age, most people are afraid to team up with someone else. Too many bad experiences I guess. Young people are still gung ho though. So if you are in your 30's, I would consider you as well. I'd say if things are going good for your career & you are satisfied with your living arrangements, then stick with what's working. If you are living in a dangerous neighborhood or apartment complex, it might be time for you to upgrade. If you are working a dead end job & looking at being poor your entire life, you really might want to consider this.

title: Guy who wants a LTR with a women who believes in god
text:
Hello,

I know this isn't the place to really find someone. There are a lot of crazy people girls and guys who look at Craigslist, there are also a few people who have an ounce of sanity that aren't with that particular group, just passing the time, or just curious to see what kind of people are posting here. 

I've posted here before. I have met some weird, crazy people. I am hoping that someone looks at this and is attracted to what I'm seeking, rather then my looks. I am not a piece of meat, nor do I want a one night stand. I want a relationship with a woman that has similar likes, a great personality, and who believes and loves god. I consider myself a Christian, though I don't belong to any particular religion. I believe in Jesus Christ, and that he died on the cross for our sins, and I believe in God who created heaven and earth. I'm looking for a woman that believes the same thing and wants to have a loving family some day. Someone that will share their love with her, and treat her like a lover, and best friend. Someone that will celebrate his love for god with her, and yes, even go to church and pray with her randomly.

I am single, obviously. I have no kids. I have an alright job, that pays the bills. I have a vehicle, and my own place. I don't go to church on Sunday's that often because I don't usually have them off, but I'm hoping once I have established work history at the place that I'm working, I can start to ask for them off or at least the mornings, so I can go celebrate the word of god with my fellow Christians. Don't get me wrong, I'm not one of those people who press the bible on others, or talk about religion 24/7 or anything like that. I just wanted to get that out there because that's something I've been really wanting to do. 

I don't go to parties, I don't go to clubs, and I don't fool around with other women. I'm in my late 20's and I normally just go home after work, and hang out with my buddies that are online. I'm not from this state either. I was born in California, and moved here in my mid 20's. I enjoy this state very much because it is usually quiet, and drama free. (I don't go starting drama either so that i'm lucky).

Women ask me all the time what kind of person I'm looking for.. Well, here it goes. Keep in mind I'm not expecting a women to be perfect by all means, or have every single quality that I put down here. So, if you are still reading, please don't get discouraged by anything I might say here. Just keep reading, and maybe smile a little bit. :)

I am looking for a women that wants to share her life with someone, and get married, and maybe have kids some day. (I am accepting of a women who has kids to)

I am looking for a women that has a good heart, is always smiling.
A women who is confident in herself, and has good hygiene (That's a must).
A women who believes in God.
A women who has lots of love to share and is dying just to share it with someone. I want a women that wants to be loved, and cherished as she should, and who also is capable of loving someone to cherish them just the same.

I know this is fairy tale maybe.. But I am very hopeful!

I have a few hobbies that might discourage you from further communication besides reading this. But I'm looking for the perfect fit for me. 

I am a movie goer.. I love movies, they are fun to watch, and fun to talk about later on. 
I love sports! NFL football, though I'm really not a college fan, I respect the fans and I'll watch a game or two. I like OU and OSU. So i'll watch both. (They are both representing Oklahoma right?)
I love video games... I am however, not addicted to them, so don't judge me. 
I love the outdoors, and traveling. There is so much to see and we shouldn't always be cooped up here!

Women are always asking me what type of girl I am looking for body type wise. Everyone is beautiful in their own way, with any type of body. I am here writing this for someone to find me who has an amazing personality. Looks, and body type, and such come as a bonus. There isn't really a set body type out there, everyone is attractive in their own ways, as long as they take care of themselves. I am an average guy, who is starting to run in the mornings, and hit the gym at nights. I plan on getting very muscular, and athletic looking. I'm not there right now, but some day I will be.

Your ethnic group doesn't matter to me either. I am not a racist towards anyone. Black, white, brown, yellow. All the same to me. Though I wouldn't mind meeting someone of another ethnic group that can speak another language. That would encourage me to learn something new. :)

Okay, well.. If this peaks your interest feel free to send me an E-mail. I am not going to put my picture here, or E-mail. I want to see if anyone real replies to this. Put (I believe in god) in the subject to weed out spam, and fake E-mails, and please, please, please, include a picture of yourself, and your age. Maybe your phone number to? You don't have to put that right away, but I'll send you a picture of myself in return and tell you more, and answer any questions you might have. Have a great day, and god bless you. :)

title: Looking for a relationship
text:
Hello there, 

Here is a little about me:

I live in Lawton, (Obviously). Was born in San Diego California, parents were in the military, moved around, and ended up in Wisconsin for most of my life. So with that said, you can only guess what NFL football team I like lol. I ended up here in Oklahoma on a whim, and it's a very long story, not really going to type it all out in here. This place is alright, very quite, aside from the booms from the base, which is alright. Like the thunderstorms in the spring time as well. (Not the Tornado's so much tho).

I have a full time job, and a car. I wont say where I work because I don't want any creeps showing up at my work or anything like that. Get to know me, and you will find out lol. I don't have much family here, most of my family lives in other states. I'm the oldest out of 4 kids. Two sisters, one brother. (All who live in different states). 

When it comes to doing things for fun, well.. I could be considered boring by some, I suppose. I like to go to Mt. Scott and hang out up there sometimes, on nice days when I'm off. I enjoy going out to the Gym and working out. I go about every day unless something comes up, or I'm feeling so sore I just don't want to do it lol. However, I'm usually there the next day, when I skip a day working out harder because I missed one lol.

I enjoy going out to the movies from time to time. Yes, I've been going alone, and I think the reason is pretty obvious. I also don't mind sitting at home and watching netflix, or a tv show on the internet when I can find them. I wonder if there are any women out here in the Lawton area that are geeky, or gamers? I would get along great with you, if you were. However, if you weren't I would still get along with you unless you are so country that we just cant relate lol. I'm not Country at all, but I do enjoy going out and doing things outside, and even sometimes out of my own comfort zone. You only live once right? 

So, I'm looking for pretty much my doppelganger, but the opposite sex. Someone that's flirty, funny, affectionate, loving, caring, and a family oriented individual. I would like to have kids some day, and a family. If that's something you're not interested in, don't be afraid to message me anyway. You never know what we would have in common besides that. I mean, I've come to the point in my life where I know it might not be a thing some day, but if it is I'll be happy either way, with someone that I love very much. 

Well.. I'm going to try not to make this thing to long. If you're interested then message me for sure, lets talk and get to know each other. Please, with the E-mail you send me include a picture of yourself, and maybe something you like, or like to do in the subject line. If you don't have those I wont respond. (Also Age doesn't matter to me.. as long as you're not under 18, and older then 40)

Un' lookin ta make sum new friends, jus the same! Ok, ladies with me, what you see is what you get. I'm a real cowboy, who's fell off a few horses & been in a few bar fights. All in my past ofcourse. I am a confident man that knows what he wants. I workout in a local the gym, weightlifting & get an average of 7 ta 12 miles a day bicycling. My dad raised me ta Respect women & treat um' right! My last relationship lasted 6 months & ended cuz the kids had a lack of discipline & respect. It sure aint the first relationship that I've walked away from cuz of that very same reason. Un' yes I know how ta spell. lol! My mom is a school teacher & she laughs at me & says 'Brian Keith'. (Yup, tiz my middle name) I jus choose ta spell my words the way I awnta. I'm only interested in a woman who (even if she lives in the city) in her heart, is country! Well... Um... I grew up with a daddy who worked us kids "tails off" & momma made sure we made it ta church at the least once a week. Skinny dippin in fishin ponds & dancin around bonfires. Noodlin catchfish outa the rivers. Though, I'm far from perfect, I wuz raised & beleive in good morals & live by them. As my O'l man would say "Son ya gotta walk the walk if yur gonna talk it. I beleive that I have a good personality & aw-ite sence of humor. Heck, I know that I come from "Good Family" so I figure that speaks for itself. People seem ta take a liken ta me where ever I go. I reckon it's the "Southern Hospitality!" lol~ I've traveled 48 states. Been everywhere except for Hawaii & Alaska. Chased the rodeo, since I wuz a young. Yup, I've got my scars, LOL! Love ta fish & hunt. Love ta cook. Both of my parents would be in the kitchen tagether, if ya know what I mean. Bar-B-Que is my specialty! Certified GrillMaster right here! Campin with a good fire at night, long walks thru the woods or even a park, cuddlin on the couch with a good movie & a pizza or some takeout is what I miss having someone ta do it with. I beleive that sex is healthy, mentally as well as physically. I'm very Passionate, tho i'm a 'freak' in bed.! I love sex & alot of it! Un' I'm great at it! Forgive me for bein so blunt, but hey, atleast i'm honest. If sparks (love) is there, I can go all night long! I'm very attracted ta Cowgirls, Latinas & a woman thats just plain Country! I love the songs 'Hell On Hells' & 'Shake It For Me'! I'm also very family oriented. Playin with kids, its the best! I think that kids are GODs way of sayin the world will go on, atleast for now, that is. I like ridin my Mountain Bike down the road with no hands, it's fun! Spiderman is my favorite superhero! Well, next ta the Lone Ranger that is! LOL! Batman is pretty cool too. Like N.F.L. Football, N.B.A. Basketball, playin jus as much as watchin though I aint Pro! (lol!) Nascar is aw-ite, especially when they crash! Rodeo most of all, ofcourse! I love horses & bulls. I no longer own any, but do have recent pics with horses from a Ranch I worked & lived on in Menifee, CA. Would like ta own my own ranch someday. Well, for the moment I've been going out singin Karioke or Dancing somewhere & have a few drinks or going ta a sportsbar, somewhere. Un' sumtimes a few to many! Ooops! lol! Have won several contest, doin both. "If it's got hair on it, I can ride it! If it's got a beat, I can dance ta it!" Though, I do it for the fun! I wanna learn the 'Salsa' (Latin) dancing! ANyone teach this Cowboy? Grew up singin in a 4 man quartet with my brother & 2 friends in our church. Un' my family sang bluegrass. I married way too young. I know that now. Most of the time I listened ta my dad, but obviously thats one time that I didn't & wished now that I had. I've been divorced for almost 12 years now. I always said that I'd give marriage only one shot, but who knows... I'm learning that we never know what cards life may "deal" us. I'm jus happy livin my life ta the fullest. One thing that I do know is.. that I reckon I'd like someone ta grow old with, before I leave this o'l world.(wink!) Any questions? I'll do my best ta give ya nothing but an honest answer. I do dip copenhagen, but went ta the pouches & cuz I wanna quit. (Un' I do have a cell phone) On the weekends, I usually go ta go out for sum Karioke & Dancin & ride the Mechanical Bull! Un' if theres sum sparks... I am willin ta relocate.if ya get my meaning. Yes, I got a Fo-Hawk haircut. I think they're so cool! (Tho, ya can't tell when I'm wearin one of my hats. lol!) title: Intimacy, Trust, Respect, and Fun
text:
Hi, thanks for reading this, sorry if it's a little long.

If you are like me you are perhaps a little lonely and are looking for companionship, a friend, a partner, and a lover. Lack of time or whatever reason has led you here, like myself, to the internet to try and fulfill those needs. 

But, if you experience has been anything like mine, all you are finding are people with terrible manners, questionable morals, and who have led their lives in an utterly disastrous way. And they all want 3 things, for you to take over all of the hard things in their life and rescue them, money, and sex.

It's enough to drive you crazy. Aren't there any sane, normal, people around anymore? It seems like there used to be. Surely they can't all have been married off or just disappeared.

Well I think normal people still exist. And I'm going to give this a try and see if I can find one, or any.

Here's what I would like; I want someone to share intimacy, trust, respect, and fun with. 

Someone who isn't hideously ugly, with some self respect, and a has kind nurturing personality. Someone who has a healthy sex drive and doesn't mind sharing that with me. 

Someone who may or may not be stunningly gorgeous but is what most people would consider attractive, even if they may have put on a few pounds or are a work in progress. Someone who doesn't have several kids, and hasn't been married more than once. 

Someone who while everything may not be perfect, has themselves relatively together and who is ready to take on the challenges of a relationship. Someone who is ready for the intimacy, security, passion, disappointments, and joys that a true, lasting relationship can bring.

I don't think that's too much to ask for. That's pretty much me in a nutshell too. So if you are this "normal" person, please by all means message me with your name, number, age, and picture. 

Also please tell me if you have been married before and if you have kids, and how many of each.

My age limit is 18 - 35ish, I'm not ruling out anyone over 40 - 50, but that's pushing my age limit. 

Thanks!

title: Seeking a muse
text:
I'm posting this here because I'd like to eventually move towards possibly getting into some kind of a relationship. As for this moment and the near future i'm just looking for somebody to talk to and who will appreciate and even possibly inspire some of my writing. I'm a dreamer, that's where I'm at and where I thrive. I'm going to include a short scene I've just worked up as an example. I could reveal so much more but as far as this ad is concerned I'm merely interested in an individual who would like to take a long stroll through the world of fiction with me. I ask that you be able to maintain contact regularly because what's the point of a muse who is only capable of inspiring on rare occasions. Thank you and here is the scene....

The night was cold. Wind blew smoke, ash, and dust across the debris, the dead, and the wounded. The five stood reflecting on the events. Movies, even the most detailed, could have never prepared them for the reality. While the images might be similar, blood soaking into dirt, tanks and other vehicles smoldering in ruin, cries from men on deaths door as they screamed for their loved ones. All this and more could be captured on film, could be painted, or even written down into some history book. The missing link. The one thing that bore down onto them as the adrenaline wore off and their senses returned to a more normal state was the smell. Blood, oil, fire, gunpowder, burning flesh, and even the tiniest hint of sweat all mixed together. It was the smell of war, an aroma that assaulted the air and warned of death. The most primitive portion of the human brain was awake and screaming. It was human instinct that was begging them to run and hide. Rational thought is what made humans different, and it is what kept them where they stood. The battle was over, they had been victorious. When a group is comprised of individuals who can turn into a human inferno, absorb energy, control energy, fundamentally alter the molecular bonds within their own body, and one who could most easily be defined as a mentalist. It's not all that surprising that even a modern military force didn't have a chance. Mat took a deep breath and refocused his effort in shutting out the thoughts of those around him. Individuals in pain radiated such psychic energy that they had a way of pushing into his mind. The two energy users were standing close. They were, of course, husband and wife. Jason holding Nikole as she absorbed excess energy from him. Mat had not seen her this exhausted since they had gained their abilities. Victoria, the fusion based pyromancer, was flickering softly as she suppressed her abilities just enough so that she wouldn't be standing in the open, nude. A soft wave of energy pushed against them all as another women teleported to them. She handed the burning woman a foil-like blanket and she covered herself as her fire went out. Collecting the backpack which contained clothing for her. The largest of them all was the man known as Ryok. He could shift his molecules to form different compounds from steel to snow. While his physical shape didn't change it allowed him a wide range situational advantages. He hugged his teleporting wife and then turned to Mat. 

"should we be go?" he asked. Mat sighed heavily and after a short moment of consideration he responded.

"You go ahead, I'm going to hang around for a few." His friends all looked at each other uncertain if leaving him alone was the best idea. Jason, the male energy user, spoke up in his usual cocky manner.

"Don't worry I'll stay and protect the poor telepath." He said as he slapped Mat on the shoulder with a smile. Everyone's tensions seemed to fade as they just made their own responses and then moved to make physical contact with the teleporter as she moved them through space to some other location on the planet. Once they were gone he stepped next to Mat. "So what's going on?"

"I'm not entirely certain. I just got the odd feeling, like there something, or someone, out there." Mat said looking around.

"Well I promise you there are plenty of individuals out there." Jason responded pulling out a cigarette and lighting it as another individual who was in pain fell silent.

"No, somebody different. As if this individual were like us." Mat said trying to figure out what his intuition was attempting to tell him.

"You gave us our talents, how is it possible that there would be another like us out there?" Jason responded looking around uneasily. 

"I'm not certain and with all the injured I can't open my mind in an effort to locate them or even begin to answer such a question." Jason took a long drag from his smoke but didn't respond. He just stood next to his friend and waited looking out across the hell-zone they had created.

title: Searching for specific and high class kind of Lady
text:
I know this is a long shot, but I am searching for a very specific kind of lady to fulfill my love life.

The Lady I am envisioning should possess the majority of the following qualities. This is a list of my preferences, and as such, I have the right to be as specific as I deem necessary. My preferences might hurt some people; if this is the case, simply skip my ad because my intention is NOT to offend, but to find my ideal match. Thank you!

My ideal Lady is:
- Between the age of 40 and 55 (I am 58)
- Slender to slightly overweight (I am 180 lbs)
- Professional and successful at it; better if wealthy (I am a business owner)
- Caucasian or Asian (I am Caucasian)
- 5'0" to 6'2" tall (I am 5'8")
- Attractive (as I am)
- Smart, witty and funny (I am very funny and spontaneous)
- Full of energy and with a positive outlook about life (I want to be surrounded by positivity)
- Not too many kids (I think 2 to 3 max to be ideal)
- Religious or political views are not important to me, as long as you respect my liberal views. I do not go to Church, but you are completely free to attend service
- I am against drugs and heavy drinkers. (I drink socially and I use an eCig)
- You must live in Oklahoma City or Edmond. I do not believe in long distance romance.

Now something more about me. I am a great kisser and lover, very passionate about everything I do. I am also a great cook, and if only I had some spare time, I would be also a great house keeper. I work a lot, but I know how to have some good fun. I travelled all over the world, so I am open to most cultures.

I know this woman exists, so I encourage her to contact me. I am not fond of people spending their time, always glued to their smartphone; social media is interesting, but I want somebody who has a life.

Since on CL there are many flaggers and spammers, I need you to do 2 things:

- Change the subject of the email (when answering) to "Lasting Love" (so I can detect spam)
- Possibly provide me with your email address

Thank you for your time!

title: Lookin for wannabe lady trucker
text:
Are there any non smoking trucker ladies that might want to drive team with me later on. Initially, I need someone to house/cat sit so I can drive a truck again myself. Then I'd be willing to pay to send you to school ($3500), & after about a year, i'm fairly certain the company would let me train you myself. I do have over 3 yrs exp otr. There are a lot of advantages to driving team. Higher pay, longer trips, more west coast loads, you get tired just swap drivers, someone to help navigate, easier to scale loads.... 

I don't care if you are a bit chunky. I don't like skinny chicks much anyway. I'm white, 6'1" 175, so I'm not going to embarass you. I don't talk much either. I mainly just prefer peace & quiet, although on the road, a person really does have to keep the cb on for safety reasons, & the radio on to break the monotany.

We can make $100k per yr, & that's without pushing it. I'd rather stay out 30 days at a time to make good money, rather than run like hell for a couple of weeks. It's a tough way of life, but if you aren't a glamour gal, you can handle it. Forget the makeup, shaving your legs, & wearing hot clothes. I'm just looking for someone that is easy to get along with. I know I am. If you miss a gear occasionally, no biggy, I'm not the best gear jammer in the world myself. I actually would consider myself to be the perfect trainer though. I don't raise my voice or holler at people. My job would be to help you be successful, not make your life a living hell.

I do need to clarify that I'm not offering you a full time salary to cat sit, so you can quit your day job. Yes, that would be a nice gig if you could get it, but taking care of a cat is not that hard. I'm thinking I'll take the utilities out of $500 & pay you the rest. Plus, I'll take care of any unexpected bills you have within reason.

The real benefit, besides a free place to live, would be teaming up with me, & making $100k per yr. I'll make sure this house gets in your name too. I'd even be willing to marry you if we make a good team. I'm not going to use you & toss you aside. Besides, half that $100k is yours to sock away anyway, so you can't lose on this deal. If you want to keep your day job, leave the trucking to me, & keep this a business relationship, that's fine too. If you have a lot of stuff, I would be willing to pay up to $100 a mth to put it in storage, & gradually replace my stuff, after we get your name on the deed.

I will admit my cat is spoiled to no end. He has been neutered, but is still a real go getter. He normally stays out all night long in the summer time, but through the winter months you need to stay up till midnight or a little later to make sure he gets in the house. I have one pet door going into the garage & I leave the big garage door up 6" for him, but that needs to be closed when he comes inside for the night. We do have possum & occasionally skunks around here, so it's not a good idea to leave the door up all night long.

I will say I don't get many inquiries. It would seem that by our age, most people are afraid to team up with someone else. Too many bad experiences I guess. Young people are still gung ho though. So if you are in your 30's, I would consider you as well, but I would prefer someone older. A mother daughter team would be excellent as well. I'd say if things are going good for your career & you are satisfied with your living arrangements, then stick with what's working. If you are living in a dangerous neighborhood or apartment complex, it might be time for you to upgrade. If you are working a dead end job & looking at being poor your entire life, you really might want to consider this.

title: Young boy lookign for his Mommy
text: Hiya, I'm 20 (about to be 21) going to school and I need/want a Mommy. I've been slowly accepting that I'm a sissy (maybe even trans) and I'm kind of loving it. I've not made great strides yet, but I doing pretty good I think. I'm not at my goal of passing %100 yet, but I really do think I can get there; I just want help. It's kind of boring to do this on my own so I think it would be nice if I had some one with experience with this kind of stuff to help me out. I want ya to be somewhat in shape (I'm losing weight my self), under 40, and disease free as I am. Please keep in mind that I'm a work in progress, but doesn't it sound fun to help make me ;P. This isn't a hookup, this is a longish term things, so I'd want to get to know ya first. Please include some kind of pic in first email so I know your real and you'll get mine.

title: Divorced, separated or abandoned?
text:
I'm separated and would like to meet someone who is either in the same situation, has been, or at least knows the pain and uncertainty of being alone and missing companionship. 

I'm not in a good place right now, am probably not great boyfriend material, but would at least like to have a person that can be the friend who is the voice of experience, reason and/or an understanding at a very uncertain time for me. 

Not sure exactly what this looks like, how it would work, or where it would go. But if you have a heart and enjoy meeting someone who "may need a little work" then I would like to meet you.

I'm over 50 (but still young) and enjoy meeting persons of all ages and races.
